attributes.action: Make vasectomy reversals available on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe in todays currant socity that many couple's are facing the prospect of life without children as their partners have had a reversal.  I propose that as the vasectomy is available on the NHS - the reversal should also be available.  I am 29 and my fiance is 41 - we are desperate for another baby but cannot afford the £4000 fees for a reversal.  I am not suggesting that this should be made an easy option but the NHS needs to get into the 21st centuary.  I need your support - please sign!!!!!
